JavaScript
a. Prototype based programming
b. new features in JS
c. modules
   1. module	
   2. module format:
	IIFE : Immediately Invocable Function Expression (IIFY), Common JS, AMD (Asynchronous Module Definition), UMD (Universal Module Definition), ES6 modules etc.
   3. module loader:
	Require JS, System.register()

a. Framework: Angular
b. Library: React, Vue

Node JS:
 server side framework
 Node runtime is built at the top of v8 engine
